component.text:
Cisco Focused Technical Support
Cisco High-Touch Operations Management Service
Level 1: Augment the customer's staff with a dedicated operations manager 8 hours a day, 5 days a week to expedite issue resolution, identify measures to help prevent issues from recurring, and manage service requests to closure.
Cisco High-Touch Technical Support Service
Level 2: Access a designated team of specialized Cisco engineers to respond to customer needs 24 hours a day, 7 days a week for rapid issue resolution and recommendations to improve network operations.
Cisco High-Touch Engineering Service
Level 3: Receive custom network diagnostics from an assigned Cisco network engineer whose expertise is aligned with customer needs and is available 8 hours a day, 5 days a week. The customer receives in-depth network analysis to isolate the root cause of problems, software version referral in response to events on the network, recommendations for corrective and preventive actions, and on-site visits.
A PDF guide that outlines the services that Cisco's Technical Services provide. http://www.cisco.com/application/pdf/en/us/guest/products/ps2978/c2044/cdccont_0900aecd8039b86e.pdf
